result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael J Savage was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Conceal (<=$500) [Modifiers: Penalty - Retail Theft (<=$500)], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(d).
  • Obstructing an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: To pay the costs of the action.   If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt. To pay supervision fees as ordered by the Dept. of Corrections.

Maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol.  Not to possess or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription and then only take in the amount and frequency prescribed.  Not to possess or use any drug paraphernalia.  No contact direct or indirect with BP Station on  Michigan St. and Travel Center on Hwy 42/57.

Complete any counseling, evaluations, programs and assessments, including AODA assessment, as appropriate resulting from the Department's COMPAS assessment. Defendant must have a DNA sample on file with the State of Wisconsin and pay a DNA surcharge.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael J Savage

defendant.name: Savage, Michael J
defendant.address: 1203 S. Duluth Avenue, c/o Door County Jail, Sturgeon Bay, WI 54235

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Michael J Savage in court with attorney Brett E Reetz.  Defendant Michael J Savage in custody.  Joan M. Korb appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Minute sheet. State gives plea agreement.  Court questions defendant on change of plea.  Rights/elements/max. penalties reviewed with defendant.  Defendant enters no contest plea to Cts. 1 & 2. Defense stipulates to factual basis to accept plea.  Court finds pleas made freely, knowingly and voluntarily, accepts pleas, and finds guilty of Cts. 1 & 2. Defendant must have a DNA sample on file with the State of Wisconsin and pay a DNA surcharge.  State/Defense make joint sentencing recommendation. Court makes statement, imposes sentence. Bond is no longer in effect.

ADDRESS INFO for Michael J Savage
Current: 1203 S. Duluth Avenue, c/o Door County Jail, Sturgeon Bay, WI 54235   (Effective: 08-20-2015)
Prior: 252 Thorne Street, Apt. 2, Sturgeon Bay, WI 54235
Defendant's sister called. He does NOT live at 252 Thorn St, Apt. 2 and she does NOT want his mail delivered there.

Defendant Michael J Savage in court with attorney Brett E Reetz.  Joan M. Korb appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court reviews events in file. Defense waives reading of the complaint, enters not guilty plea. Court finds probable cause for bindover. Bond remains in effect.  Status conference scheduled for November 6, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Michael J Savage in court with attorney Gregory A. Gerbers.  Defendant Michael J Savage in custody.  Joan M. Korb appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Gerbers indicates he has a conflict with representing defendant, will have counsel appointed to represent defendant in all files.   Copy of Complaint given to Defendant in Court.  Court reviews charge(s), max. penalties, right to counsel. Court adjourns matter to allow PD office to appoint new counsel. Bond remains in effect.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 10, 2015 at 10:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Michael J Savage
Current: 252 Thorne Street, Apt. 2, Sturgeon Bay, WI 54235   (Effective: 08-20-2015)
Prior: 2 Thorne Street, Sturgeon Bay, WI 54235
Defendant was fingerprinted by jail staff. (fingerprint card destroyed 11/10/15)

No contact direct or indirect with BP station on Michigan St. and BP Travel Center on Green Bay Road/Hwy 42/57.   Maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol. Not to use or possess any alcohol.  To be fingerprinted and photographed before leaving the Justice Center. Must contact the Clerk of Courts office within 24 hours with current address.

Defendant Michael J Savage appears by video conference along with attorney Gregory A. Gerbers who appears in person.  Joan M. Korb appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State gives incident report, potential charges. Court questions Defendant on address/employment history, reviews right to Counsel. Court finds probable cause, sets bond.  Initial appearance scheduled for August 31, 2015 at 10:00 am.
